name: dispatch
description: Discord chat capture and archival tool

scripts.rebuild: bun build src/bun/index.ts --outdir build/dev-win-x64/Dispatch-dev/Resources/app/bun --target=bun --external electrobun/bun --external puppeteer-core && bun build src/control-ui/index.ts --outdir build/dev-win-x64/Dispatch-dev/Resources/app/views/control-ui --target=browser && cp src/control-ui/index.html build/dev-win-x64/Dispatch-dev/Resources/app/views/control-ui/index.html && cp src/control-ui/style.css build/dev-win-x64/Dispatch-dev/Resources/app/views/control-ui/style.css
